name: Learn American English Through Story
description: Learn American English And Improve Vocabulary Through Story English audio book read in an American accent.  Learn English through story. Improve your English vocabulary and increase your listening ability.  Learn American Stories include short stories at various levels to further improve reading and listening skills in English.  Listen and Read Along - Text with Audio - For Learning English American Stories for English Learners Stories sorted by  the best stories in the world with great reading.   You can learning English american with listening these audio and so you will be able to speak and listen to foreigner very well.Becuase English is very important language for the people over the world nowadays that they always use English to communicate each other from one country to other and hence, please Listen and read improve your English language.   Categorized by skill level  Beginners & Intermediate learners  Speaking English american Fluently Basic and Learn English as you read and listen to a weekly show with  short stories by famous American authors.
